front.title: Camellia Galois Counter Mode (GCM) Cipher Suites for TLS

abstract.t: This document describes the use of the Camellia in Galois Counter Mode (GCM) as a Transport Layer Security (TLS) authenticated encryption operation. This document defines TLS cipher suites that use Camellia-GCM with RSA, DSA, Diffie-Hellman-based key exchange and Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC).
